content.text: A cable screen shall not be used where a PEC is required to withstand large currents (e.g for lightning  protection or as power fault current return).
A PEC shall be earthed at least at one point. The planning of any additional earthing arrangements shall be  in accordance with the HD 384/HD 60364 series and/or local regulations as appropriate.
Earthing connections at the PEC shall be made to the external surface of the conductor material.
Conductive pathway systems in close proximity to HV power supply cabling shall be protected from electrical  hazards by means of protection earthing and/or sectioning.
